#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <string.h>

int dp[7][7];

int cal (int i, int j, int m, int n) {
	if (dp[i][j] != 0)
		return dp[i][j];
	if (i == m || j == n)
		return 1;
	dp[i][j] = cal(i, j+1, m, n) + cal(i+1, j, m, n);
	return dp[i][j];
}

int main () {
	int t;
	scanf ("%d", &t);
	while (t--) {
		int m, n, i, j;
		scanf ("%d %d", &m, &n);
		for (i = 0; i <= m; i++)
			for (j = 0; j <= n; j++)
				dp[i][j] = 0;
		printf ("%d\n", cal (0, 0, m, n));
	}
}
